title: How Advisors Can Manage Their Social-Media Presence Like Pros
description: Jeff Bradanini, financial advisor and director of marketing for Beirne Wealth Consulting, explains how advisors can best use social media and digital marketing to gain new clients.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Jeff Bradanini, financial advisor and director of marketing for Beirne Wealth Consulting, explains how advisors can best use social media and digital marketing to gain new clients.
